preface.title: Target Audience
preface.para: This guide is aimed at developers who want to use the JBoss XACML to implement complex Policy Infrastructure.

preface.title: Preface
preface.para: Commercial development support, production support and training for the JBoss XACML is available through JBoss Inc. The JBoss XACML is a project of JBoss Security in the JEMS product suite.

Authors:
Anil Saldhana - JBoss Security and Identity Management Project Lead
